mapper.sql: BAR_Article.ID as ID ,BAR_Article.UpdateDate as UpdateDate ,BAR_Article.PhotoPath as PhotoPath ,BAR_Article.Contents as Contents ,BAR_Article.CreatedBy as CreatedBy ,BAR_Article.MerchantCode as MerchantCode ,BAR_Article.Abstracts as Abstracts ,BAR_Article.CreatedDate as CreatedDate ,BAR_Article.Title as Title ,BAR_Article.ViewNum as ViewNum ,BAR_Article.ArticleType as ArticleType ,BAR_Article.UpdateBy as UpdateBy
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BAR_Article
and BAR_Article.ID like '%${auditRemark}%' OR BAR_Article.Title like '%${auditRemark}%' OR BAR_Article.ArticleType like '${type}' and BAR_Article.CreatedDate >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and BAR_Article.CreatedDate <= '${edate} 23:59:59' AND MerchantCode = #{merchantCode}
